tool_description: Processes one-dimensional consolidation test data to determine compression indices, preconsolidation pressure, and settlement parameters.

sample_ids.description: List of sample IDs with consolidation test data

test_duration.description: Duration of each loading increment in hours

casagrande_method.description: Use Casagrande method for preconsolidation pressure

error_messages: Invalid sample IDs: One or more samples do not have consolidation test data.
Invalid loading sequence: All pressure values must be positive and in ascending order.
Invalid test duration: Must be a positive number representing hours.
Invalid specimen dimensions: Height and diameter must be positive numbers.
Insufficient consolidation data: Samples must have complete time-settlement data.
usage: Provide sample_ids, loading_sequence, test_duration, and specimen dimensions. Optionally enable casagrande_method and secondary_compression analysis.

compression_indices.description: Compression index (Cc) values for each sample

coefficient_of_consolidation.description: Coefficient of consolidation (cv) values in mÂ²/year
